"}]}, {"type": "list_item", "children": [{"text": "The following categories of borrowers are eligible under the scheme:"}]}]}, {"type": "paragraph", "children": [{"text": " a) Individual Weavers who have directly availed loans for weaving purposes; "}]}, {"type": "paragraph", "children": [{"text": " b) Weaver Groups having availed loans for weaving purposes on a pro-rata basis as per the amount drawn by each member, the aggregate amount subject to the overall ceiling; "}]}, {"type": "paragraph", "children": [{"text": " c) Credit extended to holders of Weaver Credit Cards; "}]}, {"type": "paragraph", "children": [{"text": " d) Weavers having Power Loom Units below 5 HP capacity and who are availing of the existing 50% Power subsidy scheme.
